phases.name: Foundation (MVP Core)
phases.description: Establish clean architecture, core editor experience, and local file persistence

milestones.title: Clean React-based UI architecture
milestones.description: Organize components, hooks, types into well-defined folders. No inline CSS, rely on Tailwind + shadcn/ui

milestones.title: File Browser (Folder Sidebar)
milestones.description: Collapsible folder tree with File System Access API support, drag-and-drop reorganization, metadata display

milestones.title: Novel Editor Integration
milestones.description: Tiptap-based editor with draggable blocks, slash commands, grab handles, minimal UI chrome

milestones.title: Tab System for Multi-File Editing
milestones.description: Browser-style tabs for opening and switching between multiple files

milestones.title: Theme System with Subthemes
milestones.description: Dark/light modes with customizable editor subthemes for focused writing

milestones.title: Responsive Layout Handling
milestones.description: Mobile, tablet, desktop breakpoints with collapsible panels

milestones.title: Settings Page
milestones.description: Font selection, tab size, editor preferences

phases.name: Writing Workspace
phases.description: Build the modular writing experience with sidebar organization and arrangement view

milestones.title: Workspace Sidebar
milestones.description: Toggle-able sidebar containing Ideas bucket, Chapters list, and Scenes hierarchy. Items are draggable

milestones.title: Idea Buckets
milestones.description: Drag-and-drop space for loose thoughts. Extract blocks from editor to bucket, drag back when ready

milestones.title: Arrangement View
milestones.description: Vertical timeline-like layout for blocks/scenes with drag-and-drop reordering. Like a DAW arrangement

milestones.title: Block Extraction to Cards
milestones.description: Shift-drag or context menu to send editor blocks to Ideas bucket as cards

milestones.title: Command Palette
milestones.description: Notion/Cursor-like search window for ideas, scenes, characters, places, plot threads

milestones.title: Chapters & Scenes Structure
milestones.description: Named containers with ordered blocks, collapsible, metadata-rich

phases.name: Intelligence Layer
phases.description: Add AI-powered metadata extraction, embeddings, and smart search

milestones.title: Auto-Generated Metadata Extraction
milestones.description: Extract characters, settings, tone, plot-phase classification, POV from blocks automatically

milestones.title: Embeddings Pipeline
milestones.description: Background API route generates embeddings on block create/update. Store in pgvector

milestones.title: Smart Search with Embeddings
milestones.description: Semantic search: 'show all fragments involving character X in a tense scene'

milestones.title: AI Organization Tools
milestones.description: Auto-grouping similar ideas, structure suggestions, continuity detection

phases.name: Mobile & Distribution
phases.description: Package for iOS App Store using Capacitor wrapper

milestones.title: Capacitor Integration
milestones.description: Set up Capacitor project to wrap Next.js as iOS WebView app

milestones.title: Offline Capability
milestones.description: LocalForage or IndexedDB for offline document storage, sync when online

milestones.title: CI/CD Pipeline for App Store
milestones.description: GitHub Actions with macOS runner, Fastlane for TestFlight/App Store uploads

milestones.title: App Store Requirements
milestones.description: First-launch screen, settings page, offline state, privacy declarations

phases.name: Advanced Features
phases.description: Long-term features for power users and collaboration

milestones.title: CRDT-Based Real-Time Collaboration
milestones.description: Y.js or Automerge for conflict-free real-time editing

milestones.title: Character Relationship Graphs
milestones.description: Visual maps of character connections, semantic tagging

milestones.title: Timeline/Narrative Visualization
milestones.description: Zoomable timeline view of story structure, relationship overlays

milestones.title: User Accounts & Cloud Sync
milestones.description: Supabase or Clerk auth, cloud document storage

milestones.title: AI-Assisted Story Node Generation
milestones.description: LLM-powered suggestions for plot development, character arcs
